jv.Sponsorship_Events_Videos_caption_1: 2022虎年新春到来之际，欧宝体育携手意甲豪门尤文图斯俱乐部与众球星给您拜年啦！祝您虎虎生威！虎运亨通！
jv.Sponsorship_Events_Videos_caption_2: 欧宝体育和尤文图斯圆满合作一周年！在未来的合作中双方也必定将会竭力为全球粉丝与用户展现最佳的体育娱乐精神，提供最为即时、奢华、顶级的线上线下互动娱乐体验。
jv.Sponsorship_Events_Videos_caption_3: 2021新春到来之际，欧宝体育携手意甲豪门尤文图斯俱乐部，祝您杠上开花，节节高；一路开胡，鸿运当头！
jv.Sponsorship_Events_Videos_caption_4: 意甲豪门尤文图斯足球俱乐部与亚洲领先体育娱乐平台之一的欧宝体育举行官方签约仪式正式宣布双方合作关系。
jv.Sponsorship_Events_Videos_caption_5: The Lantern Festival is here! OB Sports and  some your favourite Juventus stars are here to wish you Happy Lantern Festival and best of lucks!
jv.Sports_Highlights_description: 尤文图斯——意大利足球的领军俱乐部，在截止到2021年这十年间，创纪录地连续九次夺得意甲联赛冠军，完成队史上38次夺得意甲联赛冠军的壮举。而在欧战赛场上，尤文更是欧陆第一支把欧洲三大杯（欧洲冠军杯，欧洲联盟杯，欧洲优胜者杯）都收入囊中的球队。尤文图斯，不仅是意大利的冠军队伍，也是欧战的强劲团队。
jv.Sponsor_Information_1: 意甲豪门尤文图斯足球俱乐部与亚洲领先体育娱乐平台之一的欧宝体育举行官方签约仪式正式宣布双方合作关系。
jv.Sponsor_Information_2: 欧宝体育全球关系发展总监兼发言人William Robert与尤文图斯亚太区董事总经理Federico Palomba共同出席并签署赞助协议。
jv.Sponsor_Information_3: 自此，欧宝体育正式成为尤文图斯官方区域合作伙伴，两家知名品牌将通过深入合作，共同 “携手拼搏，直至巅峰，竭力为用户提供最佳体育与娱乐体验”。
jv.Sponsored_event_photos_1: 欧宝体育全球关系发展总监兼发言人William Robert与尤文图斯亚太区董事总经理Federico Palomba在官宣发布会签名墙上签名留念。
jv.Sponsored_event_photos_2: 欧宝体育全球关系发展总监尤文图斯传奇人物拉瓦内利和托里切利见证OB体育与尤文图斯丝绸旗帜的交流合作周年纪念大会。
jv.Sponsored_event_photos_3: 欧宝体育欧洲公共关系发言人Damon Eduardo与尤文图斯首席收益官Giorgio Ricci、尤文传奇球星拉瓦内利、托里切利在双方合作周年发布会上合影留念。

av.Sponsored_Gala_Special1: 正月十五元宵到，欧宝欧气跟随到！欧宝体育携手英超劲旅阿斯顿维拉众球星和传奇球星祝您元宵节快乐，心想事成！
av.Sponsored_Gala_Special2: 英超阿斯顿维拉足球俱乐部与欧宝体育合作百日盛典&正式发布会在英国伯明翰维拉公园球场盛大举行！
av.Sponsored_Gala_Special3: 2021年6月22日，亚洲领先体育娱乐品牌欧宝体育正式签约成为阿斯顿维拉足球俱乐部的全球顶级合作伙伴及官方球衣袖标合作伙伴！
av.Sponsored_Gala_Special4: The Lantern Festival is here! OB Sports and its partner premier League powerhouse Aston Villa and some of the football stars wishing you Happy Lantern Festival and best wishes to all of you!
av.Sports_Highlights1: 阿斯顿维拉足球俱乐部（绰号维拉人）是一家位于英格兰中部伯明翰市的足球俱乐部，于1874年创立，现时于英格兰足球超级联赛竞逐，是1888年甲组联赛及1992年英格兰足球超级联赛首届赛事球队，因此阿斯顿维拉也是英超之中历史最悠久的球队之一，其主场位于伯明翰市的维拉公园球场。
av.Sports_Highlights2: 早年，阿斯顿维拉曾经七次赢得顶级联赛冠军和七次英格兰足总杯，更于1982年获得欧洲联赛冠军杯和欧洲超级杯冠军。
av.Sponsor_Information1: 2021年6月22日, 欧宝体育成为阿斯顿维拉全球顶级合作伙伴及官方球衣袖标合作伙伴。欧宝体育的品牌标志将出现在维拉2021/22赛季的新球衣袖标上,并将在所有阿斯顿维拉主客场及一线队的比赛中展现。届时，在全球最受瞩目的英超联赛上，欧宝体育将携手阿斯顿维拉俱乐部为广大球迷和用户提供更好的赛事体验。不仅如此，双方的合作将覆盖全球诸多领域，包括比赛日的联合活动，全球范围的企业社会责任项目，以及其它贯穿维拉球迷和欧宝体育用户的合作
av.Sponsored_event_site1: 阿斯顿维拉知名球星摩根·桑松 (Morgan Sanson)，阿什利·扬 (Ashley Young), 马特·塔格特 (Matt Targett) 身着欧宝体育主场战服为欧宝体育品牌发言！
av.Sponsored_event_site2: 英超劲旅阿斯顿维拉足球俱乐部与亚洲领先体育娱乐平台欧宝体育签约成功！
av.Sponsored_event_site3: 阿斯顿维拉首席商务官Adam Lowe与欧宝集团国际业务总裁Kai Webb展示寓意美好的 '88' 号球衣。
av.Sponsored_event_site4: 阿斯顿维拉首席商务官Adam Lowe与欧宝集团国际业务总裁Kai Webb在阿斯顿维拉球员更衣室合影。

terms.description1: Members can be promoted to the corresponding VIP level before 24:00 the next day if their accumulated deposits and accumulated turnover meet the requirements of the corresponding level.
terms.description2: VIP level can be promoted when the corresponding requirements are met, meaning VIP level can be promoted from VIP 0 to VIP 5 within a day if member fulfilled the corresponding VIP requirement.
terms.description3: Members need to complete the maintenance turnover requirements within 90 days to maintain their VIP level. If member is being upgraded to next VIP level during this period, the maintenance turnover requirement will be recalculated according to the current level.
terms.description4: If a member fails to complete the corresponding maintenance turnover requirements within a quarter (calculated within 90 days), the system will automatically downgrade single VIP level, and the corresponding rebates and other bonuses will also be adjusted to the downgraded VIP level.
terms.description5: Tier Upgrade bonus can be collected manually on the Bonus Center in the wallet page after the member reaches the VIP level. The tier upgrade bonus for each level can only be obtained once per member. (Tier Upgrade bonus can be withdrawn after x1 turnover )
terms.description6: Members who celebrate their birthday within three months of registration will not be able to receive birthday bonus this year. Members who have registered for more than three months can claim in the bonus center on their birthday, which can be collected once a year. (The birthday bonus can be withdrawn after x1 turnover).
terms.description7: Members who has accumulated the valid turnover requirements corresponding to the members' VIP level (subject to the VIP level at 23:59 on Sunday) within the previous week (0:00 on Monday to 23:59:59 on Sunday) will be eligible to receive the weekly Angpow. Please contact our 24/7 customer service to redeem the weekly Angpow after 13:00 every Monday. (Weekly Angpow can be withdrawn after x6 turnover)
terms.description8: The VIP cash rebate will be calculated based on the valid bets made by members between 00:00 and 23:59 Malaysia time on the day. Proceed to bonus centre under wallet for manual collection. (The VIP cash rebate can be withdrawn anytime without turnover requirement).
terms.description: OB Entertainment reserves the right to revise, stop and final interpretation of the event.

terms.title: Event terms & Conditions
terms.1: All new OB members can participate in this promotion.
terms.2: This promotion only applicable to account with FIRST successful deposits. Only total amount of deposits accumulated within 48 hours counted towards the requirement of this promotion. This bonus cannot be used in conjunction with any other bonuses.
terms.3: An account can only receive the first deposit bonus once, and the validity period of the bonus is 30 days, afterwhich, will be forfeited.
terms.4: After meeting the deposits requirement, members can click 'Redeem Now' on the event page to collect the bonus from our Customer Service Agents. Bonus will be issued to the main wallet within 24 hours.
terms.5: 6 times of turnover is needed before withdrawal of bonus can be made. For example, member first deposit/s totaled MYR 1,000 and redeem MYR 88 bonus, total turnover requirement will be MYR88*6= MYR528.
terms.6: Each valid player, each mobile phone number, e-mail, bank account, each IP address, and each computer can only enjoy this bonus once. If found violated, OB entertaiment reserves the right to forfeit the bonus and winnings.
terms.7: In order to avoid differences in text understanding, OB Entertainment reserves the right of final interpretation of this promotion.
terms.1_1: During each natural month, cumulative effective betting amount generated by member in any of the following products: Sport products (IGK Bet and CMD 365), and Esport products ( TF Gaming, CMD 365). Member can apply for the corresponding realbet bonus, each member can apply seperately from these 2 categories during a month; For example: if the accumulated effective betting amount of the member in the Sport and Esport products reach 25,000,000 respectively , member can choose to apply MYR 58,888 bonus for MYR 117,776 in one month.
terms.2_1: After meeting the realbet requirement, members can click 'Redeem Now' on the event page to claim the bonus from our Customer Service Agents. Bonus will be issued to the main wallet in 24 hours.
terms.3_1: 6 times turnover is needed before bonus withdrawal can be made. For example, user hit monthly turnover of MYR 50,000 and redeem MYR 118 bonus, MYR118 required x6 turnover (MYR118 x 6 = MYR708) in order to withdraw.
terms.4_1: Draw result, betting both sides, voided/ cancelled games or bet placed containing selections of odds less than 0.5 for asian odds and 1.5 for european odds are excluded in the turnover calculation.
terms.5_1: Each valid player, each mobile phone number, e-mail, bank account, each IP address, and each computer can only enjoy this bonus once. If found violated, OB entertaiment reserves the right to forfeit the bonus and winnings.
terms.6_1: If member found to have abnormal bettings and arbitrage behaviors, the company reserves the right to terminate the account and forfeit all bonuses and profit.
terms.7_1: In order to avoid differences in text understanding, OB Entertainment reserves the right of final interpretation of this promotion.

referral_program.step1:
Introduce OB
to your friends
and family
referral_program.note: *Referral bonus required x3 turnover or realbet for withdrawal
referral_program.term1: The reward will be credited into your account as soon as  your referee completes the first deposit requirement.
referral_program.term2: You are required to make a bet amount of x3 turnover or realbet of the REFERRAL BONUS before withdrawal can be made.
referral_program.term3: There is no limit to the number of friends you can refer to, although we do reserve the right to adjust or change the referral program rules at any time.
referral_program.term4: All offer is restricted to only one free account per individual, family, household address, email address, telephone number, bank account and IP address.
referral_program.term5: OB Entertainment will check for duplicate or fake accounts and will not pay out referral bonuses on these accounts. Duplicate or shared finances will result in disqualification.
referral_program.term6: This bonus cannot be used in conjunction with any other bonuses offer.
referral_program.term7: Draw results, betting both sides, voided/cancelled games or bet placed containing selections of odds less than 0.5 or 1.50 (Decimal Odds) and any bets on 3 Pictures, Casino Hold'em/Poker, Blackjack, RNG games or 4D Lottery are excluded in the turnover calculation.

help_page.problem:
Problem not resolved? Please contact
Customer Service for assistance
help_page.Need_assitance: Need assitance? Please contact our Customer Service

register_page.des1:
Click the 'Register' button in the login page
  • Please note that the username consists of 4-11 characters, at least 2 letters + numbers, the first letter have to be an alphabet; the password length is at least 8-12 characters (AZ, az, 0-9) combination of letters + numbers, And please keep the password strictly confidential;
  • Please make sure that you are over 18 years old and have read our rules and terms before register.
register_page.2: 2. What to do if you forget your username
register_page.des2: If you forgot your username, you can contact our online customer service in time to provide you with necessary assistance 7x24 hours a day.
register_page.3: 3. What to do if you forget your password
register_page.des3: Click the 'Forgot Password' button on the login page. Fill in the account name, authenticate, set a new password, and complete.
register_page.des4: After successful registration, some information is not editable to protect your privacy. If you have any questions, please click to consult online customer service.
register_page.5: 5. Am I allowed to bet on OB?
register_page.des5: Before browsing and experiencing this site, please make sure you are over 18 years old and agree to our terms and conditions. Different countries have different regulations, please follow local regulations and laws before betting; OB official is not responsible for any losses caused by the above reasons.

deposit_page.des1:
• Select which bank you wish to transfer to.
  • Selected bank account will be shown and you can copy and paste the account number when you proceed with online transfer.
  • Enter the amount you wish to deposit or simply click on the Quick Amount button available below.
  • Attach your bank receipt when deposit is done.
  • Select available promotion if you wish to redeem any promotion.
  • Click on submit.
deposit_page.des2:
• Select which payment gateway you wish to use.
  • Select your desire and available bank.
  • Enter the amount you wish to deposit or simply click on the Quick Amount button available below.
  • Select available promotion if you wish to redeem any promotion.
  • Click on submit.
deposit_page.des3:
• Select crypto you wish to deposit.
  • Select your prefer network.
  • Save the QR code shown or simply copy the wallet address for your crypto deposit.
  • Click on COMPLETE TRANSFER when crypto your deposit is done.
  • Contact customer service if you wish to claim promotion.

promotion_page.des1: After logging in to your account, click on the deposit page and select the corresponding promotions during deposit.
promotion_page.2: 2. When will the promotion be distributed
promotion_page.des2: The promotion will be automatically distributed by the system, and you can withdraw money after the required turnover (not limited to certain game). For details, please check the promotion Event Details page.
promotion_page.3: 3. What should I do if I have not received any bonuses or gifts after the promotion application is successful?
promotion_page.des3: If you do not receive the bonus within the specified time after your application for the promo is successful. Please feel free to contact online customer service at any time.

Browser_Guide_page.1: 1. What browser to choose to get the best betting experience for OB
Browser_Guide_page.des1:
• IE11 or above
  • Google Chrome
  • Firefox Firefox
If you are using a handheld mobile device, we strongly recommend that you access it through your phone's own browser. If you are using a browser other than the above and are having trouble accessing OB, we recommend that you click the link above to install the latest version of the browser. If there is a problem with browser access, please contact our 7*24 online customer service for help.
Browser_Guide_page.2: 2. Why using a browser with a lower version will lead to a decrease in the betting experience and account insecurity
Browser_Guide_page.des2: First of all, IE6 or other low-version browsers are extremely inefficient, and many novel and animation effects cannot be loaded, resulting in extremely poor results when users read and play games; secondly, low-version browsers are less secure, and hackers can easily exploit them Virus or Trojan horse implantation, which will cause your betting experience and funds to be greatly threatened. Therefore, we strongly recommend that you upgrade your browser to the latest version to get the best gaming experience and premium service from Opel.
Browser_Guide_page.3: 3. Do I need any programs or browser plug-ins to run the website
Browser_Guide_page.des3: Our website does not require additional plug-ins to browse. However, some interactive information and assistance, such as our casino and live dealers, may require a Flash player to display properly. Click here to install Flash Player Plug-in: A browser plug-in is a piece of software that adds a specific function or service to a browser. Some common plugins are Java, Flash Player, Adobe Acrobat, QuickTime and Microsoft Silverlight.

Anti_Hijacking_Guide_page.des1:
• Long press on the connected WiFi name
  • Modify the network configuration
  • Show advanced options
  • Change IP settings to static
  • DNS1 changed to 8.8.8.8
  • DNS2 changed to 8.8.4.4
If you are using a handheld mobile device, we strongly recommend that you access it through your phone's own browser. If you are using a browser other than the above and are having trouble accessing OB, we recommend that you click the link above to install the latest version of the browser. If there is a problem with browser access, please contact our 7*24 online customer service for help.
Anti_Hijacking_Guide_page.des2:
• Click ⓘ next to the connected wifi name
  • DNS Options
  • DNS1 changed to 8.8.8.8
  • DNS2 changed to 8.8.4.4

Withdrawal_page.des1:
A. MYR withdrawal
  • Log in to the OB account - withdraw money;
  • Withdrawal usually takes 3-15 minutes for your withdrawal to arrive in your bank account. If it has not arrived in your bank account within 30 minutes, please contact the online customer service for verification;
  • For the first withdrawal, please add a valid bank account number first.
  • After adding bank account number step completed, submit for withdrawal request at the withdrawal page.
Withdrawal_page.des11:
B. USDT withdrawal
  • Please bind the withdrawal address first. The binding steps are: Withdrawal - Add virtual currency address. (Or: Withdrawal - USDT Withdrawal - Add Virtual Currency Address)
  • Select the virtual currency address to be withdrawn, and pay attention to the interface prompts whether the address is supported for withdrawal.
  • After verifying that the estimated payment amount indicated on the page is correct, click [Withdraw Now].
Withdrawal_page.des12:
C. Adding virtual currency addresses requires attention:
  • The virtual currency protocol corresponds to the virtual currency address, otherwise the account will not be credited.
  • The virtual currency address needs to be filled in correctly, please check it carefully, otherwise it will not be able to arrive to respective account.
Withdrawal_page.des2:
• The cold wallet does not involve legal currency transactions. USDT is stored in the public chain, and the funds are safe and not affected by the exchange or the company where the wallet is located.
  • Do not withdraw funds directly to exchanges such as "Huobi" and "okex". It is recommended to withdraw funds to cold wallets such as "i'm token" and "Bihui" first.
  • When you need to use money, you can withdraw coins from the cold wallet to the exchange, and conduct legal currency transactions on the exchange. The USDT that is not used temporarily can continue to be stored in the cold wallet.
  • Do not open a cold wallet for fiat currency transactions. Once opened, it will lose the function of a cold wallet and become an exchange.
  • Withdrawing coins from the cold wallet to the exchange will incur the miner fee (handling fee) of the public chain.
    imToken official website: https://token.im/
    Coinhui official website: https://www.coinhui.cc/
Withdrawal_page.des3: 1. What should I do if I forget the withdrawal password? - If you forget the withdrawal password, please contact the online customer service team for assistance in time.2. Can I use someone else's bank card to withdraw money?- In order to ensure the safety of the customer's account funds, the withdrawal needs to use the game account's own bank card to withdraw money, and the name of the withdrawal bank card must be the same as the registered name.
Withdrawal_page.4: 4. What should I pay attention to when applying for withdrawal?
Withdrawal_page.des4:
• The name of the bank card bound for withdrawal must be the same as the registered name of the game account;
  • The bank card information bound to the withdrawal must be correct;
  • If you have not applied for any bonus offer, you can apply for withdrawal after the bet has doubled the turnover;
  • If you apply for the first deposit bonus, you need to meet the valid wagering requirements stated in the promotion;
  • Withdrawal applications are available 24 hours a day.
Withdrawal_page.5: 5. Can I bind multiple bank account?
Withdrawal_page.des5: Member accounts can be bound with multiple bank accounts for withdrawal operations, select "Manage Bank Account" in the account page, and add new ones.
Withdrawal_page.6: 6. Why does the withdrawal need to be reviewed?
Withdrawal_page.des6: Withdrawal audit is a simple verification step before the relevant department handles the withdrawal for you. It is to ensure the safety of customer funds, so it is necessary to verify the relevant information.

Sport_Betting_Guide_page.des1:
Select CMD Sport under Sport Games on the homepage to enter the betting interface. According to the game time, the betting interface can be divided into three types: [Live], [Today], and [Early]. Different events can be combined into a series of games.
a) [Live]
Betting on an ongoing game, players can place bets while watching the game.
Sport_Betting_Guide_page.des11: b) [Today]Betting on all matches today from 12:00 noon to 12:00 the next day.
Sport_Betting_Guide_page.des12: c) [Early]Bet on the upcoming events in the next few days.
Sport_Betting_Guide_page.des2: a) [1x2]You can bet directly on the tie of the match based on FT (Full Time) or 1H (First Half).
Sport_Betting_Guide_page.des21: b) [Handicap]Handicap betting, also called “point betting,” or “line betting,” is used to even out the playing field between two teams who are not evenly matched. The bookmaker gives a virtual advantage to the weaker team, and a virtual disadvantage to the stronger side. If you bet on the weaker team to win, they would have the edge over the stronger team, and chances would be even. If there weren't a handicap placed by the bookmaker, the stronger side would have won against the weaker team, and it would have been monotonous and predictable. You can bet directly on the match based on FT (Full Time) or 1H (First Half).
Sport_Betting_Guide_page.des22: c) [Over/Under]A sports betting OVER/UNDER is a bet where you have to correctly predict the combined score of both teams. You have to pick if the total score will be lower or higher than the number set by oddsmakers

Lottery_Guide_page.des1:
• To play lottery game, choose your favourite or lucky four-digit numbers from 0000 to 9999.
  • Then decide on your bet type i.e. "ABC" (Big) or "A" (Small); or you can play both.
  • ABC (Big) increases your chance of winning as there are 23 winning numbers to match with i.e. 1st Prize, 2nd Prize, 3rd Prize, 10 Starter Prizes and 10 Consolation Prizes.
  • A (Small) pays higher winning prizes but there are only three winning numbers to match with i.e. 1st Prize, 2nd Prize and 3rd Prize.
  • Finally, decide on your bet amount for each chosen number. The minimum bet amount for a 1+3D number is RM1.
  • There are 7 counter available to place your lottery betting may increase your chances of winning! ( Magnum, Da Ma Cai, Toto, Singapore, Sandakan, Sabah, Sarawak)
Lottery_Guide_page.des2:
• BOX Bet allows you to cover all permutations of your favourite four-digit number. For example, if you play BOX Bet on 1991, you cover six permutations i.e. 1991, 9119, 1199, 9911, 1919, 9191. The minimum bet amount for a six permutation four-digit number is RM6.
  • The number of permutations will depend on your four-digit number as categorised below.
Lottery_Guide_page.des3:
• BOX allows you to cover all permutations of your favourite four-digit number with a minimum bet of RM1. It is a fun and inexpensive way to increase your chances of winning 1+3D numbers. For example, if you play iBOX on 1991 (or 1991 IB6 where IB indicates iBOX), you cover six permutations i.e. 1991, 9119, 1199, 9911 1919, 9191.
  • The number of permutations will depend on your four-digit number as categorised below.

Sport_Guide_page.1: 1. What time is the settlement of football
Sport_Guide_page.des1:
• The settlement of all football bets is based on the 90-minute finishing time stipulated in the game. The 90-minute finishing time includes player injury time. Extra-time, penalty shoot-outs, and if the referee or the relevant governing body changes any result after the match does not count;
  • For some specific events or friendly matches with a full-time finish time of 80 minutes (2x40 minutes), all bets will be settled based on the finish time;
  • If the completion time of the junior game and friendly game is 70 minutes (2x35 minutes) or less, the company will make an announcement before the start of the game, otherwise the bet of the game will be void.
Sport_Guide_page.2: 2. What to do if the competition is interrupted
Sport_Guide_page.des2: If an event is interrupted or delayed and not restarted within 36 hours, all bets on that event will be considered void and void unless otherwise specified in the individual bet type rules.
Sport_Guide_page.3: 3. How long can the settlement be
Sport_Guide_page.des3: 1. Single bet payout - Under normal circumstances, betting on a single match will be confirmed and returned within 15 to 30 minutes after the match ends. Some events may take longer to process (such as halving, match interruption, etc.).2. First half payout- Under normal circumstances, first-half betting will be completed within 30 minutes after the end of the first half of the match to confirm the result and return the prize, some events may take longer to process (such as cut in half, match interruption, etc.).3. A series of pass payouts- Under normal circumstances, the chain pass will be paid out within 2 hours after the end of the last chain pass event of your bet order, after the official announcement of the result, some events may take longer to process (such as halving, event interruption, etc.).
Sport_Guide_page.des4: 1. When a member is betting on live ball, if the following situations occur in the field, the member's bet will remain in the state of "dangerous ball-to be confirmed". Dangerous balls are defined as:- 12-yard free throw;- Free kick (a free kick taken by the attacker near the penalty area of- Corner kicks/throw-in goals (throw-in goals by the attacking team close to the penalty area of- Team A attacks near Team B's penalty area (or Team B attacks near Team A's penalty area);2. In the following cases, the member's bet slip will be cancelled, and the member's bet amount will be refunded in full:- Goal;- Red card;3. Dangerous balls will be released in the following situations, and members' bets on the dangerous balls will be based on the market, odds and amount bet at that time;- The goalkeeper kicks the ball;- The ball goes back to the midfield line;- Own players regain possession of the ball in their own backcourt;- Offense-defense transition, the original defender takes a free kick in his own backcourt.
Sport_Guide_page.des5:
• If a match or event is cancelled, interrupted or delayed and not restarted within 36 hours of the official kick-off time, all bets on that match will be considered void and void unless otherwise specified in the individual sports rules. Bright. Certain unconditionally terminated markets will be settled accordingly. The settlement procedures for such markets are described in the separate sports rules. The result of the company's cancellation of all bets on the event is regarded as the final decision, and there is no need to refer to the decision of the official event referee or relevant departments. Chain bets will continue to be settled according to the results of the remaining events in the bet list, and the odds of the cancelled event will be calculated at 1;
  • Over/Under bets will only be settled if there is a clear result before the match is interrupted and there are no subsequent circumstances that would significantly affect the outcome of the match.
Sport_Guide_page.des6:
1. 1x2 (only win)- Handicap offers two teams and a draw as a betting option, predicting which team will win or draw at 90 minutes;2. Handicap- Predict the winning team based on the handicap information;- The settlement of bets is based on the 90-minute completion time specified in the game;- If the match is cancelled or interrupted before the end of 90 minutes, then bets that have a definite result and that will not significantly affect the outcome of the match will be settled, and all other bets will be considered void;3. Soccer Ball Handicap- According to the handicap information, predict the winning team from the time of betting to the end of the game;- The settlement of bets is based on the 90-minute completion time specified in the game;- If the match is cancelled or interrupted before the end of 90 minutes, then bets that have a definite result and that will not significantly affect the outcome of the match will be settled, and all other bets will be considered void;4. Size- Predict that the total number of goals scored in the match will be greater or less than the number of over/under goals specified in the handicap;- If the total number of goals in the match is more than the number of over/under goals in the market, it will be over. If it is less than the number of Over/Under balls in the market, it is Under;- All bets will be settled according to the number of over/under balls opened after the play period ends;5. Single and double- Predict whether the total goals scored in the match will be single or double within 90 minutes;- If the final score is: 0-0, it will be calculated as "double";- Boldness: Predict the exact score of the relevant time period in a specific match. "Any other score" means any score, not a type that already exists in a market pick list;6. Net Win- Winning value is a numerical value that distinguishes the difference in scores or goals between the winner of a match and other participants, for example: the greater the difference in scores or goals, the higher the net worth. If the match ends in a tie, it will be settled according to the tie or "0-0";7. Halftime/Fulltime- Predict the half/full time result of the match;8. Double ChanceBet on two of the three possible outcomes, home win or draw (1 and X), away win or draw (2 and X) or home or away win (1 and 2) Choices: 1X, X2, 12; if the game is played at neutral, the team listed above the board is considered the home team;"1" means: home win;"X" stands for: tie;"2" means: Away win;9. Draw HandicapThis is a market similar to a standard handicap except that it includes a tie bet type;
  • Handicap (-1) - if your team wins the game with 2 or more goal difference, you win;
  • Draw: You win if the team wins the game by 1 goal with a handicap of 1 (-1);
  • Handicap (+1) You win if your team is tied or won;
10. Total Goals- Predict the total number of goals scored by both teams;The total number of goals scored in the whole game will be settled based on the “90 minutes” of the whole game.
Sport_Guide_page.des7: The tie-breaker rule applies to all markets with multiple winners or champions (subject to market display information). For example, if there are 2 or more winners in a match, the winnings will be reduced. It is calculated by dividing the stake by the number of winners and multiplying by the original odds. This part of the principal and profit will be returned to the member, and the remaining principal will be lost.
Sport_Guide_page.des8: Parlay: Use European odds (including stake)--select two or more events in a single bet list, each event selected for a parlay bet must win this series of bet list Only as a win, as long as one of the games loses, the bet is a loser.
Sport_Guide_page.9: 9. What does double chain betting mean?
Sport_Guide_page.des9: Duplex series clearance means that multiple games are linked together to make multiple single series clearance, at least 3 games and at most 8 games. Double series clearance can be fault-tolerant. If there is a loss in a game, all the single series including the game will all be counted as losing and deducting the principal, and other single series will continue to be calculated as winning or losing.

Live_Casino_Guide_page.des1: Baccarat is a simple card game in which the banker and the player each deal two cards. The two sides have a maximum of three cards. Players can bet on [Banker] or [Player], and the player whose points are closest to 9 will win, or they can bet on the [Tie] round (that is, the total points of the Banker and Player’s cards are the same).
Live_Casino_Guide_page.des2: Figure cards (J, Q, K) and 10 are calculated as 0 points, A is 1 point, other cards are calculated according to the face value, and the point value of each hand is calculated according to the last digit of the sum of the cards. For example, a hand of cards is K, 9, 9, the point value is 8 (0+9+9=18).
Live_Casino_Guide_page.4: 4. The third card rules of baccarat
Live_Casino_Guide_page.des4: The third card rules of baccarat are used to determine when the banker and player draw the third card. The rules are as follows:
Live_Casino_Guide_page.des5: The roulette game consists of a small ball spinning on the roulette wheel, with a total of 37 numbered squares, ranging from 0 to 36. After the betting time is over, the ball will stop in one of the small squares. The purpose of the roulette wheel is to predict which square the ball will land on, and if you get it right, you win.
Live_Casino_Guide_page.des6: This game involves placing three dice in a dice cup. When all bets are settled, the dice are shaken by the croupier. What the player needs to do is predict the outcome of this game. There are many different bet types in this game, and the odds of the largest bet type are 1:180.
Live_Casino_Guide_page.des7:
• Blackjack, also known as blackjack, is one of the most popular tabletop games in the world. Blackjack is a card game in which the dealer and the player compete together. It means that the player and the dealer compare the points, and the player and other players will not make any comparisons;
  • Blackjack uses 52 cards (one or more decks) other than Big and Little King. The goal of the game is to use the sum of the cards in the hand to not exceed 21 points and to be as large as possible;
  • Blackjack was formerly known as blackjack, and there is no unified statement about the origin of the game. Blackjack wasn't popular in the United States at first, so casinos tried to offer a variety of extra bonuses to attract players to the game. One of the additional bonuses is that when the player has both the ace of spades and the jack of black (either the jack of spades or the jack of clubs), the bonus will be multiplied by 10. Such cards were called "Black Jack," and the name came to be known as the game of blackjack, and the name "Black Jack" continued even after this bonus rule was discontinued. The rules have evolved to this day, and blackjack refers to any combination of an ace plus a ten or a figurine card.
Live_Casino_Guide_page.8: 8. In roulette, how to calculate when the result is 0
Live_Casino_Guide_page.des8: 0 is not black red, big or small, or even or even; once the result is 0, all bets are lost, and only bets on or including 0 are won.
Live_Casino_Guide_page.9: 9. How to calculate the surrounding dice in the game result in Sic Bo
Live_Casino_Guide_page.des9: When the result of the game is surrounded by dice, betting (over/under) or (odd/even) items are counted as losers.
Live_Casino_Guide_page.10: 10. How many decks of cards will be used in the video baccarat game
Live_Casino_Guide_page.des10: Video baccarat consists of 8 decks of cards.

E_sport_Guide_page.1: 1. What to do if the competition is not completed
E_sport_Guide_page.des1: If a match is not completed (eg player withdrawal, disqualification or game server issue) all bets on that match will be void.
E_sport_Guide_page.2: 2. What should I do if the team/player name is wrong?
E_sport_Guide_page.des2: All bets will stand if there is a spelling error when entering the name of a sports team/player.
E_sport_Guide_page.3: 3. What should I do if I don't use the team's personnel to play the game?
E_sport_Guide_page.des3: If a team or two teams play with fewer players, all bets will be considered valid.
E_sport_Guide_page.4: 4. What should I do if the competition starts early?
E_sport_Guide_page.des4: If the match starts early before the scheduled match, all bets placed after the start of the match will be considered void.
E_sport_Guide_page.des5: 1. Winning- Predict who will win the match, any form of overtime or stoppage time will be taken into account;2. Handicap- The handicap of e-sports competitions can be rounds/games or other measurement methods according to different competitions;E.g: If Player A wins two or more rounds, the player who bets on Player A wins and the player who bets on Player B loses. If Player A wins only one more round or Player B wins, the player who bets on Player B wins and the player who bets on Player A loses.3. Large/Small Plate- Predict if the total number of maps/rounds in the match is greater or less than the line, any form of overtime or overtime will be counted.
E_sport_Guide_page.des6: 1. The first tower- The first team to destroy a tower loses this bet;2. First blood - Declare the winner of the bet on the team that has won the "First Blood" in the game;3. Be the first to get 10 kills - The first team to get 10 kills on the in-game scoreboard is the winner of this bet;4. First round - The team that wins the first round is the winner of this bet;5. Be the first to win the first 5 rounds - The team that wins the first 5 rounds is the winner of this bet;6. Duration - The total duration of the map match, according to the in-game timer;7. Matching the highest number of deaths/kills - Get the player with the highest number of deaths/kills;8. GODLIKE will appear - 9 kills by any team member;9. The Messenger is Killed - Any courier is killed by one of the teams;10. Winner of Round 1 (Pistol Round) - The winner of the first round in a map (pistol round);11. Winner of Round 16 (Pistol Round) - Winner of round 16 on a map (pistol round);12. First Baron Kill - The first team to kill the first baron;13. The first dragon kill - The first team to kill the first dragon;14. The first Luoshan kill - The first to kill the first Luoshan team;15. Destroy the first tower - The team that destroys the opposing team's towers first, including the opposing team's self-destructing towers;16. Destroy the first turret - The first team to destroy the opposing turret.

cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description11: Cryptocurrency is a currency that does not have a physical form and only exists in a digital form, also known as "digital currency"
cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description12: Its nature is similar to that of physical currency, allowing instant transfer on the Internet without geographical restrictions. Mainstream digital currencies such as USDT (Tether), BTC (Bitcoin), ETH (Ethereum), etc.
cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description13: Users can purchase digital currency through the digital currency trading platform, make payment on the platform, and convert it into MYR to play games.
cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description21: Compared with traditional transaction methods such as bank cards, users do not need to give their name or card number to complete crypto currency transactions, avoiding sensitive information leakage.
cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description22: The blockchain technology used in crypto currency has the characteristics of decentralization, does not require a clearing center organization to process data, and greatly shortens the transaction time.
cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description23: Not issued by the central bank or authorities, not regulated by banks, users can use the funds stored in their digital wallets as they wish.
cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description3: Tether, also known as USDT, is worth the equivalent of the U.S. dollar. 1USDT=1 US dollar, this feature makes USDT the largest and most circulated stable currency in the global encrypted digital currency. It has good value preservation and is also the main currency used by the website.
cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description31: USDT will not have huge fluctuations in the rise and fall, it only changes with the change of the US dollar exchange rate, and the price is very stable.
cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description32: Most currencies cannot visually see the corresponding value. It needs to calculate the conversion, which is very inconvenient. And USDT can intuitively see how many dollars are worth.
cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description33: The circulation of USDT is based on the Bitcoin blockchain, which is stable and reliable. Due to its constant value, it can be converted into other currencies for circulation at any time.
cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description41:
• Largest cryptocurrency exchange in the world
  • More advanced charting
  • Secure digital currency wallet and payment speedin seconds
cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description42:
• Extremely simple user interface
  • Very high liquidity
  • Solid variety of altcoin choices
cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description43:
• More than 230 tradable assets
  • Strong customer support in multiple languages
  • Smooth fiat currency deposit and withdrawal payment service platform
cryptocurrency_introduction_page.description44:
• Licensed as a Recognized Market Operator (Digital Asset Exchange) by the Securities Commission Malaysia
  • Not available for US customer
  • Small selection of cryptocurrencies

compare_network_page.subtitle11: TRC20: based on the TRON network protocol
compare_network_page.description11: TRC20 has the lowest withdrawal fee, which means that users can enjoy low-fee exchange withdrawal services. At the same time, the TPS of the TRON network can reach thousands of levels, and transactions can be confirmed in seconds.
compare_network_page.subtitle12: ERC20: Based on the Ethereum network protocol
compare_network_page.description12: Ethereum issues its own native token along with other tokens. But the rules for thousands of tokens are different, which is very detrimental to the later market development. So the token issuer made a smart contract standard, which is ERC20.
compare_network_page.description31: Low handling fee, account in seconds.
compare_network_page.description32: Fees and speed are consider medium
compare_network_page.warning: *The USDT addresses corresponding to the two protocols do not communicate with each other. When performing operations such as transfer and reload, you should carefully check the correct address.
